post_message: Diego Reyna, a Mexican-Canadian, said he placed the Mexican flag atop the nearly completed Trump Tower because he was tired of disparaging remarks made by Donald Trump. "MR Trump, we did our best work, your tower here in Vancouver is premium quality, and we were a crucial part of it, not just Mexicans but immigrants as a whole," he wrote on Facebook. "The insults you have said about us, have not changed our work ethics." Reyna says he hopes his message of "love and unity" will reach the Republican presidential candidate.
